title: Ini Nan Unna En Kanna Pola Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Bae, kannaala thittidathe
Yenna bae
pazhasellam parandhu poye poyache
Bae antha Siripa niruthidathe
Yenna Bae
ini adhu thaan maa en vela-nu aayache

Ini nan unna
en kanna pola parthukka poren
Thunaiya kaatha
andha mazhaiya kooda serthukka poren

Unakku edhellam
pudikkdumunnu therinjikka poren
En bae needhaanu
oorukellam therivikka poren

Anbe en bae neethane
endhan anbe neethane
En bae endraal
ini ellathukkum mela nee thaane

En bae neethaney
endhan thembe neethaane
Munbae munbae vandhaai
anbae neethaney

Bae, kannaala thittidathe
Yenna bae
pazhasellam parandhu poye poyache
Bae antha Siripa niruthidathe
Yenna Bae
ini adhu thaan maa en vela-nu aayache

Ini nan unna
en kanna pola parthukka poren
Thunaiya kaatha
andha mazhaiya kooda serthukka poren

Thalli nee ponaa thaedi varuveney
Thakka samaiyathil kaiya tharuveney
Ohhh un akkam pakkama aalu illaati
Pakkam varalaamey kanne oruvaati

Pudhusaa kaadhala
palagi paakuren, Nalla neram
Edhukku edanjalaaa
mile kanakkula dhooram

Kaadhal chinname
unna paarkanumnu kettadhaal
Inga kondu vandheney
Anbe en bae neethane

endhan anbe neethane
En bae endraal
ini ellathukkum mela nee thaane

Bae, kannaala thittidathe
Yenna bae
pazhasellam parandhu poye poyache
Bae antha Siripa niruthidathe
Yenna Bae
ini adhu thaan maa en vela-nu aayache

Ini nan unna
en kanna pola parthukka poren
Thunaiya kaatha
andha mazhaiya kooda serthukka poren
